DOC.brief_summary: Mitral valve repair for ischemic mitral regurgitation is performed primarily by annuloplasty. There is some degree of late failure, which may be due in part to the type of ring employed. We want to compare late results with mitral valve annuloplasty using flexible vs rigid annuloplasty rings.
DOC.brief_title: Repair of Ischemic Mitral Regurgitation: Comparison Between Flexible and Rigid Annuloplasty Rings
DOC.criteria: All patients undergoing CABG with Mitral valve repair for ischemic MR Other valve procedures
